message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. I think this is a fair deal considering what you'll gain from it.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but I'm looking for something closer to my original price. Would you consider $13,800?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'd like to propose $13,650. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
